description: A pleasant hike along an old cart track to the junction of the Milk River and its North Fork. Various side trips possible to explore the surrounding Twin River Heritage Rangeland Natural Area.
directions: From Milk River, drive 4 km south along Hwy 4.  Turn right onto Hwy 501 and drive 27 km west to a pullout on the right. (1/2 km after the bridge crossing the Milk River)
title: Route to Milk River fork
